title: The Great Flood Begins
summary: Genesis 7 recounts Noah entering the ark with his family and animals. The floodwaters cover the earth, destroying all living things not on the ark.

faq.question: How long did it rain?
faq.answer: It rained for 40 days and 40 nights, covering even the tallest mountains.

faq.question: Who was saved in the ark?
faq.answer: Noah, his wife, his three sons and their wives, and pairs of all animals.

faq.question: Why seven of some animals and only two of others?
faq.answer: Clean animals were used for food and sacrifices, so Noah brought extra. This shows early ideas about worship and offerings, even before formal laws were given.
